snippet.description: Essentials of Stochastic Processes . \- 2nd ed. / Durrett, Richard Dordrecht : Springer, 2012. - 268 p. ebook

snippet.title: The rate of convergence to stationarity for M/G/1 models with admission controls via coupling
snippet.description: The rate of convergence to stationarity for M/G/1 models with admission controls via coupling / Kolb, Martin ; Stadje, Wolfgang ; WÃ¼bker, Achim We study the workload processes of two restricted M/G/1 queueing systems: in Model 1 any service requirement that would exceed a certain capacity threshold is truncated; in Model 2 new arrivals do not enter the system if they have to wait more than a fixed threshold time in line. [...] arXiv:1201.0532. \- 2012\. Preprint

snippet.title: The class of distributions associated with the generalized Pollaczek-Khinchine formula
snippet.description: The class of distributions associated with the generalized Pollaczek-Khinchine formula / Kella, Offer The goal is to identify the class of distributions to which the distribution of the maximum of a L\'evy process with no negative jumps and negative mean (equivalently, the stationary distribution of the reflected process) belongs. [...] arXiv:1111.7099. \- 2011\. Preprint

snippet.title: Sleep Mode Analysis via Workload Decomposition
snippet.description: Sleep Mode Analysis via Workload Decomposition / Azad, Amar Prakash The goal of this paper is to establish a general approach for analyzing queueing models with repeated inhomogeneous vacations. [...] arXiv:1106.1919. \- 2011\. Preprint

snippet.title: Super-Exponential Solution in Markovian Supermarket Models: Framework and Challenge
snippet.description: Super-Exponential Solution in Markovian Supermarket Models: Framework and Challenge / Li, Quan-Lin Marcel F. [...] arXiv:1106.0787. \- 2011\. Preprint

snippet.title: Delay and Power-Optimal Control in Multi-Class Queueing Systems
snippet.description: Delay and Power-Optimal Control in Multi-Class Queueing Systems / Li, Chih-ping ; Neely, Michael J We consider optimizing average queueing delay and average power consumption in a nonpreemptive multi-class M/G/1 queue with dynamic power control that affects instantaneous service rates. [...] arXiv:1101.2478. \- 2011\. Preprint

snippet.title: On the Transition from Heavy Traffic to Heavy Tails for the M/G/1 Queue: The Regularly Varying Case
snippet.description: On the Transition from Heavy Traffic to Heavy Tails for the M/G/1 Queue: The Regularly Varying Case / Olvera-Cravioto, Mariana ; Blanchet, Jose ; Glynn, Peter Two of the most popular approximations for the distribution of the steady-state waiting time, W_infty, of the M/G/1 queue are the so-called heavy-traffic approximation and heavy-tailed asymptotic, respectively. [...] arXiv:1009.5426. \- 2010\. Preprint

snippet.title: Uniform Approximations for the M/G/1 Queue with Subexponential Processing Times
snippet.description: Uniform Approximations for the M/G/1 Queue with Subexponential Processing Times / Olvera-Cravioto, Mariana ; Glynn, Peter W This paper studies the asymptotic behavior of the steady-state waiting time, W_infty, of the M/G/1 queue with subexponenential processing times for different combinations of traffic intensities and overflow levels. [...] arXiv:1009.5327. \- 2010\. Preprint

snippet.title: Doubly Exponential Solution for Randomized Load Balancing Models with General Service Times
snippet.description: Doubly Exponential Solution for Randomized Load Balancing Models with General Service Times / Li, Quan-Lin In this paper, we provide a novel and simple approach to study the supermarket model with general service times. [...] arXiv:1008.3788. \- 2010\. Preprint

snippet.title: Integer Sequences from Queueing Theory
snippet.description: Integer Sequences from Queueing Theory / Abate, Joseph ; Whitt, Ward Operators on probability distributions can be expressed as operators on the associated moment sequences, and so correspond to operators on integer sequences. Thus, there is an opportunity to apply each theory to the other. [...] arXiv:1006.0686.- 2010 \- Published in : Journal Of Integer Sequences: 1 (2010) , pp. 3 External link: Preprint
